about_the_game:
Fill your wild adventures with nature-loving elves, armored beastmen, and dark magic devils with the Fantasy Character Pack 2! Gee-kun-soft is here with another character pack, this time offering up a set of 16 characters who can be party members, deadly foes, helpful NPCs, and more.

Each character comes with a walking character sprite, SV battler, enemy images, facesets with 8 different emotions, and bust images, so each character can fit into whatever idea you have. This pack also includes high-res full body art for each character, so you can resize them to perfectly fit your game or show off their complete designs in an in-game codex. So if your game has needed some new furry companions or you’ve been wanting some more devil and elf enemies, pick up the Fantasy Character Pack 2!

Features:

・16 battlers with 13 variations each (also, some have effect version)
・16 walking sprites
・16 Animated SV battlers
・16 facesets with 8 emotions each
・16 portrait bust images with 8 emotions each (also, some have effect version)
・BONUS: All 16 characters in large-scale full-character artwork


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
